entries.description: /review: Apply fix removes other issues in the same file.
Fix(Amazon Q Code Transformation): show correct diff when running consecutive transformations
Improve when the welcome page is shown in amazon q chat
Code Review: Cleaned up output logs when running /review
Code Review: Fixed a bug where applying a fix did not update the positions of other issues in the same file.
Chat: When navigating to previous prompts, code attachments are sometimes displayed incorrectly
/review: Diagnostics in the problems panel are mapped to the wrong code
Fix opentabs context possibly timeout due to race condition of misuse of different timeout functionalities
Auth: SSO session was bad, but no reauth prompt given
Reduce frequency of system status poll
Chat: When writing a prompt without sending it, navigating via up/down arrows sometimes deletes the unsent prompt.
Code Review: Fixed a bug where projects with repeated path names did not scan properly.
/review: Code fix automatically scrolls into view after generation.
Chat: improve font size and line-height in footer (below prompt input field)
